subject: RE: v1.20.1 — ALL BLOCKERS VERIFIED. Sarah says GO for PROD (pending Quinn + Gotan)
body:
Fulton,

Live verification against calendarbeaf-test.azurewebsites.net v1.20.1 — ALL PASS.

## Final Verification Results

| Test | Method | Payload | HTTP | Response | Verdict |
|------|--------|---------|------|----------|--------|
| events/count | GET | ?appId=1&ownerId=675... | 200 | {"count":0} | PASS |
| check-proximity | POST | {"latitude":42.36,"longitude":-71.06} | 200 | {"hasNearbyVenues":false,"count":0,"nearbyVenues":[]} | PASS |
| check-proximity | GET | ?lat=42.36&lng=-71.06&radius=100 | 200 | Same shape | PASS |

All 4 original blockers are resolved:
1. events/count — FIXED and VERIFIED
2. POST check-proximity — FIXED and VERIFIED (accepts both latitude/longitude and lat/lng)
3. Organizer projection — Express parity confirmed, separate enhancement ticket
4. isApproved filter — Express parity confirmed, separate enhancement ticket

## Sarah's PROD Vote: GO

From the FE perspective, v1.20.1 has Express parity on all endpoints the FE calls. The two fixes are additive (new endpoint + new method) with no breaking changes to existing behavior.

Reminder: This is the AF-only deploy. The FE migration code (apiUrlResolver.js, NEXT_PUBLIC_AF_ENABLED) is NOT on PROD yet. So this AF deploy has zero user impact today — it just gets the AF PROD environment ready for cutover day.

Final PROD approval rests with Quinn and El Gotan. If there's disagreement, they are the arbitrators.

## SNR

- S — All 4 blockers resolved and verified on TEST. v1.20.1 passes all FE verification checks. Issues 3+4 deferred as enhancements (both backends need them).
- N — Quinn and El Gotan to make final PROD go/no-go call. Separately, I'll file enhancement tickets for organizer projection expansion and isApproved filtering.
- R — Awaiting Quinn + Gotan PROD decision.

— Sarah
